item.title: Mattress, trollies (previously 2nd floor Angelina house) and other furniture, 9th September
item.description:

item.title: Two council picnic benches missing - need replacing ASAP, 9th September
item.description:
Two of Bromley Councils picnic benches are missing from the lawn. They were in a sorry state, have been taken away by IdVerde staff, but not replaced. We have a large Kent Association for the Blind picnic on Saturday and need the two replacement picnic tables as soon as possible. Many thanks in advance.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Rochester Avenue, Widmore, London
Report on FixMyStreet
